syllabus_info.syllabus_name: Cambridge International AS & A Level Business 9609

subtopic.sub_topic_name: Enterprise: The role of entrepreneurs and intrapreneurs

learning_objectives.description: the qualities entrepreneurs and intrapreneurs need for success
the role of entrepreneurship in creating and starting up a business
the role of intrapreneurship in the ongoing success of a business
the role of business enterprise in the development of a country
